description: Try our easy to follow Quick Spiced Prawn Cocktail recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Quick Spiced Prawn Cocktail Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3kg cooked tiger prawns, peeled and deveined
2 lime, 1 juiced, 1 cut into wedges (wedges to serve)
1 kaffir lime leaf, very finely shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Combine mayonnaise, tomato sauce, hot sauce, lime juice, shredded lime and chilli in a small serving bowl. Set aside.
Arrange rocket on a large serving platter or in a large serving bowl. Add avocado and prawns.
Top with lime wedges and coriander sprigs.
Serve with the spiced mayonnaise in a small bowl.
